body_html:
@ic I still couldn't get it to work.
What i did:

  1. git clone this repository
  2. git clone bazel
  3. replace all "HOST_CFG" with "host" in the entire directory
  4. ./compile the bazel directory
    5.removed the old bazel binary from /usr/bin
  5. copied the new bazel binary in output/ to /usr/bin

I still get the error, and bazel still attempts to clone the protobuf github repository and install from there.

Am I missing something?

While compiling bazel, it seemed to also have compiled protobuf, but I don't see any other binary output in /output. Perhaps there are some binaries for protobuf that I could also copy to bin?

body:
@ic  I still couldn't get it to work. 
What i did:
1. git clone this repository 
2. git clone bazel
3. replace all "HOST_CFG" with "host" in the entire directory
4. ./compile the bazel directory
5.removed the old bazel binary from /usr/bin
6. copied the new bazel binary in output/ to /usr/bin

I still get the error, and bazel still attempts to clone the protobuf github repository and install from there. 

Am I missing something?

While compiling bazel, it seemed to also have compiled protobuf, but I don't see any other binary output in /output. Perhaps there are some binaries for protobuf that I could also copy to bin?
